Package org.flixel.data

Interface Summary
FlxFadeListener  
FlxFlashListener  
 

Class Summary
FlxAnim Just a helper structure for the FlxSprite animation system
FlxDigitalPad  
FlxFade This is a special effects utility class to help FlxGame do the 'fade' effect.
FlxFlash This is a special effects utility class to help FlxGame do the 'flash' effect
FlxInput  
FlxKeyboard  
FlxKeyboardData  
FlxList The world's smallest linked list class.
FlxLogoPixel This automates the color-rotation effect on the 'f' logo during game launch, not used in actual game code.
FlxParticle  
FlxPause This is the default flixel pause screen.
FlxQuake This is a special effects utility class to help FlxGame do the 'quake' or screenshake effect.
FlxSplashScreen A splash screen is displayed when the game launches.
FlxTouch This class helps contain and track the touch pointer in your game.
